room_title: Escape room "The Disappearance of Albert Mason" by 1 Hour to Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We had a blast! The puzzles were all intertwined, the employees were super helpful and the designs of the rooms were so intricate. The best escape room by far!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Disappearance of Albert Mason" by 1 Hour to Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The puzzles in our escape room were extremely intricate and very thoughtfully put together - SO much fun, the hour wizzed by making every minute exciting!

room_title: Escape room "The Disappearance of Albert Mason" by 1 Hour to Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Simply an incredible experience! It was our first time at an escape room. Equally fun and challenging for adults and kids. An exciting adventure to say the least. Our host, Dusty, was fantastic. He gave us an appropriate amount of clues without spoiling anything. THANK YOU!!!
